Name: Bong
Description: Bong is located in the central region of Liberia, known for its agriculture, particularly rubber production, and its mining industry.

Name: Grand Bassa
Description: Grand Bassa is located in the coastal region of Liberia, known for its timber and mining industries, and being home to the port city of Buchanan.

Name: Grand Cape Mount
Description: Grand Cape Mount is located in the western part of Liberia, known for its agricultural activities, including rubber and cocoa production.

Name: Grand Gedeh
Description: Grand Gedeh is located in the southeastern part of Liberia, known for its agricultural production, including cassava and rice.

Name: Lofa
Description: Lofa is located in the northwestern part of Liberia, known for its rich agricultural land, including rice, cassava, and other crops.

Name: Margibi
Description: Margibi is located in the central region of Liberia, known for its agricultural production, especially rubber and oil palm.

Name: Maryland
Description: Maryland is located in the southeastern part of Liberia, with a focus on agriculture and natural resources.

Name: Montserrado
Description: Montserrado is the most populous region of Liberia and includes the capital city, Monrovia, which is the economic and political center of the country.

Name: Nimba
Description: Nimba is located in the northeastern part of Liberia, known for its rich natural resources, including iron ore and timber, and its agricultural activities.

Name: River Cess
Description: River Cess is located in the southeastern part of Liberia, known for its coastal settlements and agricultural activities, including rice farming.

Name: River Gee
Description: River Gee is located in the southeastern part of Liberia, known for its agricultural production, particularly cassava and rice.

Name: Sinoe
Description: Sinoe is located in the southeastern part of Liberia, known for its agricultural activities and natural resources, including timber and minerals.
